description: This API is used to query preview data from a given connection type or from a native Amazon S3 based Glue Data Catalog. Returns records as an array of JSON blobs. Each record is formatted using Jackson JsonNode based on the field type defined by the DescribeEntity API. Spark connectors generate schemas according to the same data type mapping as in the DescribeEntity API. Spark connectors convert data to the appropriate data types matching the schema when returning rows.

parameters.name: EntityName
parameters.description: Name of the entity that we want to query the preview data from the given connection type.

parameters.name: ConnectionOptions
parameters.description: Connector options that are required to query the data. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of records fetched with the request.

parameters.name: SelectedFields
parameters.description: List of fields that we want to fetch as part of preview data. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Records
nested_items.description: A list of the requested objects.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token, present if the current segment is not the last.
